guidelines: Follow Flutter best practices and Material Design guidelines
Implement error handling for all async operations
Write clear documentation for public APIs
Follow the repository pattern for data access
Add Proper comments to the code
Use named parameters for widgets with more than 2 parameters
Keep widget methods small and focused
Implement proper dispose methods for controllers and streams
Include separate data, domain, and presentation layers
Keep core utilities generic and reusable
Avoid business logic in core components
